headline: Could oil stocks become an unlikely AI play in 2026?
summary: While Wall Street grows more bullish on industrial companies that will be key to building out and powering AI data centers, could an energy giant like Exxon Mobil (XOM) be a part of the next phase of the AI Revolution? Yahoo Finance senior reporter Ines Ferré takes into account how natural gas (NG=F) and oil (CL=F, BZ=F) could react to the energy demands stemming from AI data centers. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

content.title: Could oil stocks become an unlikely AI play in 2026?

While Wall Street grows more bullish on industrial companies that will be key to building out and powering AI data centers, could an energy giant like Exxon Mobil (XOM) be a part of the next phase of the AI Revolution?

Yahoo Finance senior reporter Ines Ferré takes into account how natural gas (NG=F) and oil (CL=F, BZ=F) could react to the energy demands stemming from AI data centers.
